amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part A of House Report 115-919 to provide all students with an explanation of how to seek additional assistance from the financial aid office should they experience a change of financial circumstance. Additionally, the amendment would specify that a borrower receives the loan amount they requested.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stefanik amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Ms. Stefanik.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Stefanik amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
